SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthController
The AuthController class provides RESTful endpoints for handling authentication-related operations.
EmailService
Service class for handling email-related operations.
EmailVerificationRequest
Represents a request for email verification.
OtpAuthApplication
Main application class for the OTP Authentication service.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for setting up Redis integration within the application.
RefreshTokenRequest
Represents a request to refresh an authentication token.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for setting up the security aspects of the application.
SecurityService
Service class responsible for security-related operations.
TokenController
TokenController acts as a REST controller for managing authentication tokens.
TokenRequest
Represents a request for generating authentication tokens.
TokenResponse
Represents a response containing authentication tokens.
TokenService
Service class responsible for handling token management and verification code generation.
User
Represents a user entity in the system.
UserController
The UserController class provides RESTful endpoints to handle operations related to user management.
UserRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and custom queries on the User entity.
UserService
Service class responsible for managing user-related operations.
ValidVerificationCode
Annotation to validate that a given field is a valid verification code.
VerificationCode
Represents a verification code with its creation timestamp.
VerificationCodeValidator
A validator that checks whether a provided string is a valid verification code.
